title: Newsletter - Melden Sie sich zu unserem Newsletter an - la pura
description: Sie wollen auf dem Laufenden über unser Resort bleiben? Dann melden Sie sich zu unserem Newsletter, damit Sie nichts mehr verpassen.
text:
Nothing fits any more, we feel exhausted, sluggish, inefficient. Losing a little ballast, feeling lighter, feeling better – that would be perfect right about now.
Treat yourself to invigorating treatments and enjoy our Ladies Spa and delicious organic wholefood cuisine to your heart's content.
The F.X. Mayr regimen promotes our intestinal health, well-being and immune system.
The gastrointestinal tract is home to no less than 70% of our immune system and has more defence cells than the skin and airways combined.
The New Year's holidays are approaching. And with them the question: Where to travel?
Quickly get out of the daily grind, switch off and enjoy a pleasurable time-out for yourself or with your best friend.
Our detox packages offer delicious low-carb, low-calorie detox menus, detoxifying therapies, beneficial treatments and plenty of exercise options. And lose a bit of weight while you're at it. Start now: Detox – the SHORT-STAY PACKAGE
A "Beauty Day" at la pura is perhaps the most beautiful highlight of a busy and turbulent week!
In Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM), pain is an expression that our body and mind have fallen out of balance.
Women need to take good care of themselves and their bodies and treat their own resources sparingly. It's the only way to maintain your fitness, effectiveness and joy in life. Save -10% for stays of 1 week or more.
Looking to boost your personal zest and improve your quality of life? We will show you how to bring your body and soul back into harmony.
When is it that you most feel like a woman? Every woman has her own personal, individual answer to this question.
With valuable feel-good treatments, mental coaching, mindfulness training, nutritional advice and much more.
Experience conscious pausing, soothing deep relaxation and “coming to yourself”.
With la pura's check-ups, you can make sure that your biological clock will tick slower. We're all getting older – and 30% of that is determined by genetics, while the other 70% is in our own hands. So make the most of it!
